name: A Day at the Lake Part Two
name_original: A Day at the Lake Part Two
description: Indie the dog has been tasked with another important job by the mysterious government agent from the start. Much larger and deeper than the original game, A Day at the Lake 2 ties up loose ends, raises questions of its own, and has a hidden ending that only the most dedicated adventurers will find. Minimum of 1024x768 screen resolution required.
